review: It was a very nice experience at the clinic as my son's tooth extraction happened in a very polite and caring atmosphere. I liked the overall approach of doctors especially while taking care of kids. I would highly recommend Amit Dental clinic for all the tooth related issues.
very polite and genuine doctor, had a really wonderful experience. Highly recommended for anyone who is suffering from any kind of tooth problem.
She’s responsible, friendly *** * **** **** doctor. It’s good that we have doctor like her. Thank you
very calm in listening to the problems and very helpful and awesome prescription. helped me alot with consultation
